title: The installation of the electrical backup in all such water heating systems shall be optional depending on the nature of requirement of hot water
clause_text: The installation of the electrical backup in all such water heating systems shall be optional depending on the nature of requirement of hot water.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The installation of the electrical backup in all such water heating systems shall be optional depending on the nature of requirement of hot water.
